notesShort: Use Smash art to help break out of her long and damaging combos.
Her mobility is poor. Use Speed art to open her up and find your opportunities.
Their up-b has intangibility at the start. If you cannot intercept it before it will reach ledge, it is not worth contesting.
Beware F-Smash shield break cheese. If caught, shield SDI away or drop shield and switch to shield art. Shield SDI away will not work if caught using neutral getup at ledge.
Mix up Up-B and space it to avoid getting 2-framed with Pin. It can also hit ledgehang and kill.
Corrin can cancel Pin after the initial hit and let you go, leading to a tech chase. A-Landing in this situation will result in Shulk being +31.

fsmash.notes: Precise. Hits at roll distance from ledge.
